name: crsf
body:
/******************************************************************************************\  
Project     : $SCHEMA$
Object Name : $NAME$
Object Type : Scalar function
Created By  : $AUTHOR$
Created Date: $DATE(dd MMM yyyy)$
Approved By :
Description : $DESCRIPTION$
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Demo Call:

    SELECT $SCHEMA$.$NAME$()

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changes History:
================
Changed By  : 
Changed Date: 
Approved By : 
Description : 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changed By  : 
Changed Date: 
Approved By : 
Description : 
\******************************************************************************************/
CREATE OR ALTER FUNCTION $SCHEMA$.$NAME$
    (@parameter_name AS INT)
RETURNS INT
--WITH ENCRYPTION|SCHEMABINDING, ...
AS
BEGIN
    RETURN $SELECTEDTEXT$$CURSOR$
END
GO
